QuestData.Title: Just In Case
QuestData.Description: When we set up shop the first thing we built was the cannon. Seemed like a good place fer it.$b$bWe started buildin' the base up around it when them chompin' acid spittin' varmints came crawlin' out of the ground.$b$bThe upside though is the cannon is built, just not loaded.$b$bWe have to go down to the bottom floor of this thing anyway so may as well grab some Doomshot if you see any on your way down.$b$bBetter to load the cannon and not need it than to need it and not have it loaded.
QuestData.RewardText: While I hope we don' need to fire the big gun, I kinda hope we can fire the big gun.
